post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Accenture is the world's leading provider of management and technology consulting services and solutions. We are looking for people who bring a high-level of technical expertise, creativity and problem solving skills to deliver technology-based business solutions and manage applications as part of an SAP application management project.

Role / Responsibilities
Provide high quality first level call support for in-scope applications. Troubleshoot issues and communicate with end user. Log tickets and route tickets to appropriate 2nd line support resources. Manage trouble ticket resolution by updating ticket status and web notification, according to HP defined processes. Share knowledge with team members and contribute to solutions database, Follow procedures and standards. Provide Help Desk support on rotating basis.


Qualifications
Excellent customer service skills; Knowledge of SAP functional and technical capabilities; Experience in working in a Help Desk environment; Familiar with Help Desk trouble ticketing solutions such as Remedy


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
post.title: SAP Help Desk Analyst
